static GIS_API GisException* GisException::Create (  GisString *  message  )  [static]
 

Returns an instance of a GisException using the specified arguments.

Parameters:
message Input the error message
Returns:
Returns the GisException object

Reimplemented in GisXmlException, FdoClientServiceException, FdoCommandException, FdoSpatialContextMismatchException, FdoConnectionException, FdoExpressionException, FdoException, FdoFilterException, FdoAutogenerationException, and FdoSchemaException.
